Night hags have left behind  the  world of  the  fey to  roam  the  Lower  Planes.  They have dark  blue  or purple-black  skin  with white or  light-colored eyes  and thin, curving horns. A night hag  is  as  least  as  tall  as a human, and  most  are  stout  or  have a medium build rather  than  being  thin  or  emaciated.
